Scripts.OnEvent: if event == "BANKFRAME_OPENED" then BANK = true print("OPEN") elseif event == "BANKFRAME_CLOSED" then BANK = false elseif event == "BAG_UPDATE" then containerId = select(1,...); moveMult(containerId); elseif event == "ITEM_LOCKED" then if MOVEFLAG then bagId = select(1,...); slotId = select(2,...); blockSelect(bagId, slotId); end end
